DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy different botulinum toxin A injection pattern treat benign essential blepharospasm compare influence condition eye surface .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Different Botulinum Toxin A Injection Patterns Treatment Blepharospasm
DOC.detailed_description: The author perform prospective double-blinded randomised clinical trial 60 patient establish diagnosis benign essential blepharospasm February 2013 December 2015 . Patients receive full injection pattern 5 sit one eye medial lower eyelid waived injection pattern 4 site eye randomly . They survey ocular surface disease index ( OSDI ) , Jankovic rating scale ( JRS ) , blepharospasm disability index ( BSDI ) prior injection 1week , 1month 3 month injection . At time point , closure eyelid , tear break time ( BUT ) , Schirmer test ï¼© , low lid tear meniscus height ( TMH ) also measure .
DOC.criteria: confirm diagnosis bilateral BEB minimum 24week period since last injection require patient previously receive multiple injection BoNTA . blepharospasm know etiology ( caused medication , injury , etc . ) history surgical intervention BEB ( myectomy neurectomy ) current ophthalmologic infection apraxia eyelid opening associate levator palpebrae dysfunction
